title: Whats going on with Eternals?
body:
What is going on with Eternals we haven't gotten any recent updates and no date
I'd like to see a couple things from Eternals tho
1. If you get a Penta kill make the game say a voice line or make a new voice line from your champion that all players can hear
2. achieving a goal should give you a exclusive reward like a icon, ward, emote, or something else
3. If your going to change the mastery emote at least make it better than 3 stripes maybe something important from a champion and put it on the mastery emote like for example Aatrox's blade should be on the mastery emote once you've achieved a goal

These are some of the things i would like to see in Eternals
